TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BufferModeSettings extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class BufferModeSettings Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 設定事件提供者的 ASP.NET 事件緩衝設定。

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET event-buffering settings for event providers.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來定義事件提供者，例如重大、 通知、 分析和記錄的角色。The class is used to define roles for event providers, such as Critical, Notification, Analysis, and Logging. 每個角色都會以不同的方式適用於該角色緩衝事件。Each role would buffer events differently, as appropriate for that role. 重要的角色，例如會保留， ，和小，而分析角色會以較高的值設定這些屬性的屬性。For example a Critical role would keep the , , and properties small, whereas an Analysis role would set those properties to higher values. 此類別會對應到`bufferModes`組態檔項目。This class corresponds to the `bufferModes` configuration-file element. ## Examples 下列的組態檔案摘錄會示範如何以宣告方式指定值的數個屬性類別。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. ``` ```

param.name: name
param.span: 所建立的 物件名稱。

span.span: The name of the object being created.

param.name: maxBufferSize
param.span: 一次緩衝的事件數目的最大值。

span.span: The maximum number of events buffered at one time.
The value must be greater than zero.

param.name: maxFlushSize
param.span: 每次緩衝區更新的事件數目最大值。

span.span: The maximum number of events per buffer flush.
Must be greater than zero.

param.name: urgentFlushThreshold
param.span: 觸發緩衝區更新之前緩衝的事件數目。

span.span: The number of events buffered before a buffer flush is triggered.

param.span: 這個值必須大於零，並且小於或等於 。

span.span: The value must be greater than zero and less than or equal to .

param.name: regularFlushInterval
param.span: 緩衝區更新之間的標準時間。

span.span: The standard amount of time between buffer flushes.

param.span: 將該值設為 刻度，即可使之成為無限。

span.span: The value can be made infinite by setting it to ticks.

param.name: urgentFlushInterval
param.span: 兩個緩衝區更新之間的時間長度之最小值。

span.span: The minimum length of time that can pass between buffer flushes.
The value must be less than or equal to .

param.name: maxBufferThreads
param.span: 可同時處於作用中之緩衝區更新執行緒數目的最大值。

span.span: The maximum number of buffer-flushing threads that can be active at one time.

summary.span: 使用指定的設定，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using specified settings.

summary.span: 取得或設定可同時緩衝的事件數目的最大值。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of events that can be buffered at one time.

value.span: 可同時緩衝的事件數目之最大值。

span.span: The maximum number of events that can be buffered at one time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性必須具有大於零的值。This property must have a value greater than zero. 無效的值可能會導致儲存的組態區段時擲回例外狀況。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 預設值取決於提供者。The default value varies based on the provider. 中的物件中的提供者名稱所參考集合集合。The objects in the collection are referred to by name by the providers in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. The default is 1.
